models.name: Nike Model 1
models.description: High-performance Nike shoes with advanced cushioning technology, designed for serious athletes. These running shoes provide exceptional comfort and support during workouts and races.

models.name: Nike Model 2
models.description: Casual Nike sneakers that combine style and comfort. Perfect for everyday wear, these shoes come in a variety of trendy colors to match your fashion sense.

models.name: Nike Model 3
models.description: Stylish Nike footwear that's versatile for any occasion. With a sleek design and multiple color options, these shoes are a must-have addition to your collection.

models.name: Adidas Model 1
models.description: Adidas running shoes engineered for peak performance. These shoes provide excellent stability and support, making them ideal for competitive runners. Available in classic black, blue, and red.

models.name: Adidas Model 2
models.description: Adidas casual sneakers that offer a perfect blend of style and comfort. Experience all-day coziness with these fashionable kicks. Available in gray, green, and orange.

models.name: Adidas Model 3
models.description: Adidas high-top sneakers with a modern twist. Elevate your style with these unique kicks. Available in black, white, and yellow.
